feed.title: Hello every ones ! A message from an unknown traveller.

entry.title: Hello every ones ! A message from an unknown traveller.
entry.summary: On November 15th, 2017 at 4:41 AM, Matt Corallo, a member of the Lightning development mailing list, replied to a previous email from Satoshi Nakamoto about "keeping Bitcoin weird". The original email from Nakamoto was sent on November 14th, 2017, and discussed the importance of being optimistic and expecting success while planning ahead with strategic capacity. He also encouraged individuals to be kind to each other in the face of negative criticism. The context of the email appears to relate to cryptocurrency development, specifically the development of Bitcoin's Lightning Network. However, the mention of hair color-related hard forks lacking consensus adds a humorous and lighthearted tone to the conversation. The use of quirky language like "keep Bitcoin weird" suggests that the community values individuality and creativity in their approach to development.
